testimonials.text: He is an extremely strong developer overall, front and back-end, and will overcome any challenge thrown at him. Moreover, besides his strong points as a developer, he has an impressive eye for design. For every project, he created a detailed mock-up of each page using Adobe XD which could be easily translated into code.

He is a highly skilled developer, truly organized and fully capable of working on both the front-end and back-end of web applications. He's a strong javascript developer who picks up new technologies and is always looking to expand his knowledge with outside resources. With his creative mindset, we were able to expand many of our projects with distinctive ideas.
